reviewText: Opened three tickets, no telephone number to call. If you find a number it's to some idiot that says to text him.  This thing is the biggest rip off ever, at least I think it is - can't even get it to find out.

I've been doing yoga, on and off, for years.  I've been begging my inflexible husband to join me to no avail, until HE found THIS!  I as all for it!

This is a REAL workout.  It's not your momma's yoga.  It is not impossible for a beginner but is very challenging.  It continues to be challenging for seasoned yoga followers.

This is definitely worth your time.  It IS doable for all shapes & sizes.
